Summary: large red orange sphere moving from east to west
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Rockford
There were no other sightings in Rockford on or around January 9th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailstook my dogs out and quickly notice the object, then called my wife out to confirm what I was seeing. large solid red orangeish color sphere moving in the sky watched for about 3 mins until it was out of sight. it seemed it climbed up in to the clouds. Cant see the stars tonight due to the clouds. hope this helps. sorry no pics.
